|  [getNextUniqueId()](./blockly.utils_namespace.idgenerator_namespace.getnextuniqueid_1_function.md) | <p>Generate the next unique element IDs. IDs are compatible with the HTML4 'id' attribute restrictions: Use only ASCII letters, digits, '\_', '-' and '.'</p><p>For UUIDs use genUid (below) instead; this ID generator should primarily be used for IDs that end up in the DOM.</p> |
